WORLD_C01_DOOR_A00_DETAIL.speaker: UI
WORLD_C01_DOOR_A00_DETAIL.text: You sense a strange power on the other side of this door.

WORLD_C01_DOOR_A02_1_DETAIL.speaker: UI
WORLD_C01_DOOR_A02_1_DETAIL.text: You sense a deep darkness on the other side of this door.

WORLD_C01_DOOR_A02_2_DETAIL.speaker: UI
WORLD_C01_DOOR_A02_2_DETAIL.text: You sense a deep darkness on the other side of this door.

WORLD_C01_DOOR_A02_3_DETAIL.speaker: UI
WORLD_C01_DOOR_A02_3_DETAIL.text: You sense a deep darkness on the other side of this door.

C01_DOOR_COMM_DJUMP_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_COMM_DJUMP_000_DETAIL.text: This door looks to be special.

C01_GMCK_COMM_EMERALDRIDE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_GMCK_COMM_EMERALDRIDE_000_DETAIL.text: You can't help but feel like you've seen this...thing somewhere before. Is it even alive?

C01_GMCK_COMM_CHALLENGE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_GMCK_COMM_CHALLENGE_000_DETAIL.text: You can't help but feel like you've seen this...thing somewhere before. Is it even alive?

C01_GMCK_COMM_TRADEDRUM_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_GMCK_COMM_TRADEDRUM_000_DETAIL.text: You can't help but feel like you've seen this...thing somewhere before. What is it even doing here?

C01_GMCK_COMM_TRADEDRUM_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_GMCK_COMM_TRADEDRUM_010_DETAIL.text: You can apparently trade your belongings for other items using this machine, though you have no idea how it works.

C01_WRLD_COMM_SIUGNAS_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_COMM_SIUGNAS_000_DETAIL.text: The Dismal King has joined your retinue.

C01_WRLD_COMM_ICECASTLE_NEGATIVE_100_DET.speaker: UI
C01_WRLD_COMM_ICECASTLE_NEGATIVE_100_DET.text: After choosing to fight the final emperor and protect Alexandre, you found yourself kicked out of Grelon. You wonder what happened to Alexandre after that.

C01_DOOR_COMM_TICKET_001_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_COMM_TICKET_001_DETAIL.text: This trial pits you against the first formidable foe.

C01_DOOR_COMM_TICKET_002_DETAIL.speaker: UI
C01_DOOR_COMM_TICKET_002_DETAIL.text: This trial pits you against the second formidable foe.

C01_DOOR_COMM_TICKET_003_DETAIL.text: This trial pits you against the third formidable foe.

C01_DOOR_COMM_TICKET_004_DETAIL.text: This trial pits you against the fourth formidable foe.

C01_DOOR_COMM_TICKET_005_DETAIL.text: This trial pits you against the fifth formidable foe.
